---
id: provider-config
title: Built in provider config
hide_title: true
---

import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import MultiSingleTenant from "/src/components/tabs/MultiSingleTenant"
import BackendSDKTabs from "/src/components/tabs/BackendSDKTabs"

# Built in provider config

Below is a list of all built in providers for single or multi tenant login / SSO.

## Google

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "google",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "1060725074195-kmeum4crr01uirfl2op9kd5acmi9jutn.apps.googleusercontent.com",
										ClientSecret: "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",
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="multi">

TODO..

</TabItem>

</MultiSingleTenant>

## Google Workspaces

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "google-workspaces",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
                                        AdditionalConfig: map[string]interface{}{
                                            "hd": "example.com"
                                        }
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="multi">

TODO..

</TabItem>

</MultiSingleTenant>

## Apple

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO:",
                        clientId: "TODO:"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
                                ThirdPartyId: "apple",
                                Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
                                    {
                                        ClientID: "4398792-io.supertokens.example.service",
                                        AdditionalConfig: map[string]interface{}{
                                            "keyId":      "7M48Y4RYDL",
                                            "privateKey": "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIGTAgEAMBMGByqGSM49AgEGCCqGSM49AwEHBHkwdwIBAQQgu8gXs+XYkqXD6Ala9Sf/iJXzhbwcoG5dMh1OonpdJUmgCgYIKoZIzj0DAQehRANCAASfrvlFbFCYqn3I2zeknYXLwtH30JuOKestDbSfZYxZNMqhF/OzdZFTV0zc5u5s3eN+oCWbnvl0hM+9IW0UlkdA\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----",
                                            "teamId":     "YWQCXGJRJL",
                                        },
                                    },
                                },
                            },
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="multi">

TODO..

</TabItem>

</MultiSingleTenant>

## Discord

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "discord",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="multi">

TODO..

</TabItem>

</MultiSingleTenant>

## Facebook

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "facebook",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

## Github

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "github",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

## LinkedIn

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "linkedin",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

## Active Directory

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "active-directory",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
                                        AdditionalConfig: map[string]interface{}{
                                            "directoryId": "...."
                                        }
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

</TabItem>
</BackendSDKTabs>

</TabItem>

</TabItem>

</MultiSingleTenant>

## Okta

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<BackendSDKTabs isSubTab={true}>
<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "okta",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
                                        AdditionalConfig: map[string]interface{}{
                                            "oktaDomain": "..."
                                        }
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python">

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```

## SAML with BoxyHQ

<MultiSingleTenant>

<TabItem value="single">

<TabItem value="nodejs">

```tsx
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-node";
import Session from "supertokens-node/recipe/session";
import ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters} from "supertokens-node/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";
let { Google, Github, Facebook, Apple } = ThirdParty

TODO

SuperTokens.init({
    appInfo: {
        apiDomain: "...",
        appName: "...",
        websiteDomain: "..."
    },
    supertokens: {
        connectionURI: "...",
    },
    recipeList: [
        ^{recipeNameCapitalLetters}.init({
            signInAndUpFeature: {
                providers: [
                    Google({
                        clientSecret: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET",
                        clientId: "TODO: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID"
                    })
                ]
            }
        }), // initializes signin / sign up features 
        Session.init() // initializes session features
    ]
});
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="go">

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty/tpmodels"
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/supertokens"
)

func main() {
	supertokens.Init(supertokens.TypeInput{
		RecipeList: []supertokens.Recipe{
			thirdparty.Init(&tpmodels.TypeInput{
				SignInAndUpFeature: tpmodels.TypeInputSignInAndUp{
					Providers: []tpmodels.ProviderInput{
						{
							Config: tpmodels.ProviderConfig{
								ThirdPartyId: "boxy-saml",
								Clients: []tpmodels.ProviderClientConfig{
									{
										ClientID:     "TODO:",
										ClientSecret: "TODO:",
                                        AdditionalConfig: map[string]interface{}{
                                            "boxyURL": "..."
                                        }
									},
								},
							},
						},
					},
				},
			}),
		},
	})
}
```

</TabItem>

```python
from supertokens_python import init, InputAppInfo
from supertokens_python.recipe import ^{codeImportRecipeName}
from supertokens_python.recipe.thirdparty import Github, Google, Facebook, Apple

TODO

init(
    app_info=InputAppInfo(api_domain="...", app_name="...", website_domain="..."),
    framework='...', # type: ignore
    recipe_list=[
        thirdparty.init(
            # highlight-start
            sign_in_and_up_feature=thirdparty.SignInAndUpFeature(providers=[
                Google(
                    client_id='GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID',
                    client_secret='GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET'
                )
            ])
            # highlight-end
        )
    ]
)
```
